channel.title: Which would YOU play?
channel.description:
So I've been working on a unique concept recently and I'm wondering if it's TOO different to the point where people won't play it.
I just want your HONEST opinion on which concept you would rather play as this will be an expensive and time consuming project and I want it done properly. :)
[size=12pt][b][u]Options[/u][/b][/size]
1) Fully Functional, Flawless & Great Economy (Your Favourite Cache Version) [b]3 Isles Unique Concept[/b] - [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,667595.0.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,667595.0.html[/url]
2) Fully Functional, Flawless & Great Economy (Your Favourite Cache Version) [b]The Usual RSPS Concept[/b]
[u]Please VOTE on the poll and leave your comments below if you've got any! Thank you.[/u]

item.title: Which would YOU play?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Jarker994, post:5, topic:548795”]Thanks for all of your responses guys, it looks like I may be redirecting all of my enthusiasm towards creating a top of the range server with normal RSPS concepts and maybe I’ll change smaller aspects to make it unique but not the whole concept. You do make a good point Elrick about the PvP too, we’ll see how the poll finishes off.

Keep the votes & responses coming in guys, your feedback so far has been excellent![/quote]Yes, it would limit your community to a bunch of pkers (who tend to be trolls for the most part). If you could incorporate a way to be forcing PvM as well as PvP, then you’d have a different story.

Read full topic

item.title: Which would YOU play?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The issue with the 3 isles concept is… Well population.
Too little player = Boring, no one to talk to… etc. Because if there’s like 2 people on and they’re not on the same isle… Yeah.
Too many players = Not playable. Chaotic… How many people do you think can fit on those islands… Not very many. Plus you’re adding objects/etc for all the skills… So there’s already less space…

Read full topic

item.title: Which would YOU play?
item.dc:creator: @Jarker994 Jarker994
item.description:
@Jarker994 wrote:

Thanks for all of your responses guys, it looks like I may be redirecting all of my enthusiasm towards creating a top of the range server with normal RSPS concepts and maybe I’ll change smaller aspects to make it unique but not the whole concept. You do make a good point Elrick about the PvP too, we’ll see how the poll finishes off.

Keep the votes & responses coming in guys, your feedback so far has been excellent!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Seamen wrote:

i voted 4 the third one

Read full topic

item.title: Which would YOU play?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I would rather play a regular RSPS than be forced to do PvP.

Read full topic

item.title: Which would YOU play?
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

The 3 isle concept would be very unique. If you need any help testing anything message me on here or skype Owner_ghost. If you get this going I will for sure play, if you message me that it’s open.

Read full topic
